Name: OT301
Review Text: Interesting, alternative place. Good bar and they have a coat facility for events. Pricing is unfair: a scarf was charged as an additional item, so rather than just paying one euro for a jacket, the scarf was also charged one euro while hanging on the same single clothes hanger.

Name: OT301
Review Text: A Milestone in your Amsterdam alternative tour, a wide variety of activity to pursue, from workshop to party with diverse programmation. Check their website, the program, and tune in to the webradio weekly show !

Name: OT301
Review Text: Very interesting to see. I didn't get to party there but i really enjoyed the old school but now a club theme. :D they have different partys old the time u need to check the schedule before.

Name: OT301
Review Text: Really cool place. Fun for night parties, sure, but they also offer lots of different classes and workshops. Including (adults and) kids' sports classes. My children are doing Aerial Yoga (silks & trapeze) with Monika @ youth circus ot301 --> I cannot recommend her highly enough!!

Name: OT301
Review Text: It was Dopplereffekt live performance which was amazing! The atmosphere in OT301 club is absolutely underground. This particular party has left a really good impression!

Name: OT301
Review Text: Saw Black Midi here and countless other on their way up bands. It's a good small cultural centre with an okay (vegan) cafe.

Name: OT301
Review Text: Alternative and electronic music venue. You can play ping pong üèì on Tuesdays. Cool place!

Name: OT301
Review Text: Awesome authentic, perfect music box.

Name: OT301
Review Text: I quite like this place, especially the gallery and the cinema. They have a lot of nice activities to propose (danse, yoga, engraving, printing, boxe, aerial circus, etc... They have a lot of parties. Some artist have their studios established there. The crew is doing a lot for the neighborhood life.

Name: OT301
Review Text: Great alternative cultural space based in an old film academy on several floors. Be sure to check the agenda online before as various events take places almost each day of the week: drawing session, techno parties, ping-pong nights, movie screening, art markets, etc... The staff is lovely and drinks are cheap!

Name: OT301
Review Text: Great place for underground electric music parties. Friendly crowd, affordable drinks!

Name: OT301
Review Text: Our new favourite place in Amsterdam. A great space for music, art and talks. It has a certain vine that I like and feels very welcoming. The Wonderland monthly plays for kids are really good

Name: OT301

Name: OT301
Review Text: This place is nice for any kind of activity. You can party here, just have a drink, join the cinema days etc. If I‚Äôm not wrong, on Tuesdays they have ping-pong night, with individual tables and also a grupal one.

Name: OT301
Review Text: amazing experience starting at the door, very exclusive bike parking spots only 5 kilometers away, the wine was of such a limited edition that there was only a single glass. so underground that nobody was there!!!!! would go again every week!!!

Name: OT301
Review Text: Local artistic bohema. When entering the gate you will feel the vibe straight away. Some food, some performance, some music. If you're in Amsterdam and into modern art give it s try.

Name: OT301
Review Text: Best cultural centre of Amsterdam! Events, concerts, workshops are always interesting! Nice food and drinks with reasonable prices! Friendly atmosphere!

Name: OT301
